Cheetsheet

Probability Logic Table

Voting Formula Comment
1oo1 PA Single element system
1oo2 PAPB Both devices fail
2oo2 PA + PB – PAPB Either device fails
1oo3 PAPBPC All devices must fail
2oo3 PAPB + PAPC + PBPC – 2PAPBPC Any two devices must fail
3oo3 PA + PB + PC – PAPB – PAPC – PBPC + PAPBPC Any device fails

PFD Equations

PFD equations (not simplified) assuming all devices in the voting scheme have the same lambda:

Voting PFD PFD Avg
1oo1 1−e−λt1 - e^{-\lambda t}1−e−λt 1+e−λT−1λT1 + \frac{e^{-\lambda T}-1}{\lambda T}1+λTe−λT−1​
1oo2 1−2e−λt+e−2λt1 - 2e^{-\lambda t} + e^{-2\lambda t}1−2e−λt+e−2λt 1+2e−λT−2λT+1−e−2λT2λT1 + \frac{2e^{-\lambda T}-2}{\lambda T} + \frac{1-e^{-2\lambda T}}{2\lambda T}1+λT2e−λT−2​+2λT1−e−2λT​
2oo2 1−e−2λt1 - e^{-2\lambda t}1−e−2λt 1+e−2λT−12λT1 + \frac{e^{-2\lambda T}-1}{2\lambda T}1+2λTe−2λT−1​
1oo3 1−3e−λt+3e−2λt−e−3λt1 - 3 e^{- \lambda t} + 3 e^{- 2 \lambda t} - e^{- 3 \lambda t}1−3e−λt+3e−2λt−e−3λt 1−116λT+3e−λTλT−3e−2λT2λT+e−3λT3λT1 - \frac{11}{6 \lambda T} + \frac{3 e^{- \lambda T}}{\lambda T} - \frac{3 e^{- 2 \lambda T}}{2 \lambda T} + \frac{e^{- 3 \lambda T}}{3 \lambda T}1−6λT11​+λT3e−λT​−2λT3e−2λT​+3λTe−3λT​
2oo3 1−3e−2λt+2e−3λt1 - 3 e^{- 2 \lambda t} + 2 e^{- 3 \lambda t}1−3e−2λt+2e−3λt 1−56λT+3e−2λT2λT−2e−3λT3λT1 - \frac{5}{6 \lambda T} + \frac{3 e^{- 2 \lambda T}}{2 \lambda T} - \frac{2 e^{- 3 \lambda T}}{3 \lambda T}1−6λT5​+2λT3e−2λT​−3λT2e−3λT​
3oo3 1−e−3λt1 - e^{- 3 \lambda t}1−e−3λt 1−13λT+e−3λT3λT1 - \frac{1}{3 \lambda T} + \frac{e^{- 3 \lambda T}}{3 \lambda T}1−3λT1​+3λTe−3λT​
